name: Nathaniel Fruchter
tagline: Decision Science student at Carnegie Mellon, class of 2016.
body:
# Hi there!

I'm currently a student at Carnegie Mellon University's Pittsburgh campus (class of 2016), currently pursuing a B.S. in Decision Science, as well as a minor in Human-Computer Interaction.

I've previously worked on [Gameful](http://gameful.org/) and [EVOKE](http://www.urgentevoke.com/), as well as an assortment of personal [side projects](/projects).  I'm currently a research assistant in the Carnegie Mellon's Human-Computer Interaction Institute, studying risk taking, decision making, and how people understand the Internet (among other things).

You can contact me by [email](http://www.google.com/recaptcha/mailhide/d?k=01wW1xh53i0hbQnQf-Fk1niw==&c=gkqznY1TvLSji25ZoRBuFKZEVDFnNv7EuM4wiXA8l7A=), or on a bunch of other sites like [LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/in/nhfruchter) or [GitHub](http://www.github.com/nhfruchter).

# Projects

Selected things I've worked on or built over the years.

## Academic

* Lee, M.K., **Fruchter, N**. and Dabbish, L. Making decisions from a distance: The impact of technological mediation on riskiness and dehumanization. In _Proc. CSCW ’15 (forthcoming)_.
* _Leak Detector_ - an extension of a network monitoring utility that alerts users when certain types of personal information could be exposed to others on an insecure network.
* [Music transcription](https://github.com/nhfruchter/music-transcription) - a project for my 15-112 class at CMU. Transcribes heard audio into sheet music with a decent level of accuracy.

## Personal

* [PGH NextBus](http://pghbus.herokuapp.com) - A better mobile interface for Pittsburgh busses (uses the below module).
* [pghbustime](https://github.com/nhfruchter/pgh-bustime) - Python module that interfaces with Pittsburgh's realtime bus data API.
* [cmu-acadaudit](https://github.com/nhfruchter/cmu-acadaudit)- A prettier academic audit at Carnegie Mellon.
* Everything else on [GitHub](https://github.com/nhfruchter?tab=repositories).

## Other

* [Gameful](http://gameful.org/) - a community for game creation. (I worked on the first incarnation of the site.)
* [Urgent EVOKE](http://www.urgentevoke.com/) - "a crash course in changing the world".
* [rbox](http://redct.info/rbox/) - an encrypted, easy to set-up proxy and tunnel server with client and server software.
* [the IASC](http://theiasc.info/projects/) - fun with [alternate reality games](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alternate_reality_game).
* [Darkbox](http://redct.info/eeui/) - a zero-setup Markdown based (no HTML!) CMS with built upon plain text files.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
